name: df-psgn
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(cpsgn, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, crab(s2, cfv(cbs, cfv(csymg, cv(s0))), wcel(cdm(cdif(cv(s2), cid)), cfn)), cio(s3, wrex(s4, cword(crn(cfv(cpmtr, cv(s0)))), wa(wceq(cv(s1), co(cfv(csymg, cv(s0)), cgsu, cv(s4))), wceq(cv(s3), co(cneg(nat1), cexp, cfv(chash, cv(s4))))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ pmSgn =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà { s2 ‚àà(Base `(SymGrp ` s0))| dom((s2 \ =))‚àà Fin } ‚Ü¶ iota(s3, ‚àÉ(s4 ‚àà Word(ran((pmTrsp ` s0))),(s1 =((SymGrp ` s0)[gsum]s4)‚àß s3 =(-u(1)[^](# ` s4)))))))
comment: Define a function which takes the value ` 1 ` for even permutations and ` -u 1 ` for odd. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Aug-2015.)
